br.octahedron.cotopaxi
Enum CotopaxiProperty

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<CotopaxiProperty>
      br.octahedron.cotopaxi.CotopaxiProperty
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<CotopaxiProperty>
public enum CotopaxiProperty
extends Enum<CotopaxiProperty>

The CotopaxiFramework's properties and default values. To overwrite this values, just use System.setProperty(String, String) or pass the property value using the -D parameter. E.g.: System.setProperty("TEMPLATE_FOLDER","tpls/");

Author:
Danilo Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br
